steps.name: chapter_one
steps.text: You are at the zoo, eating ice cream from a cone.  A drop melts and falls to the ground.  You look down and notice a small creature eat it then skuttle off.

opts.text: Carry on eating the ice cream.

steps.name: ice_cream
steps.text: It's delicious, and you even find a big blob of chocolate at the bottom of the cone.

steps.name: follow
steps.text: You follow the creature and notice it looks strange and shiny.  It burrows under a hedge.  You go closer and notice a small hole.  Brushing the soil aside you find a small hatch in the ground.  What do you do?

opts.text: Cover it up and call team TRAIN for backup.
